info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 2:30PM EDT until June 02 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Hamilton County in eastern New York... Northeastern Fulton County in eastern New York... West central Saratoga County in east central New York... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 229 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Northville, or 17 miles northeast of Gloversville, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Edinburg, Northville, Mayfield, Cranberry Creek, Northampton Beach Public Campground, Hope, Benson, Fairchilds Corners, Fish House, Munsonville, Tenantville, Sweets Crossing, Benedict, Glenwild, Long Corners, Maple Grove, Broadalbin Junction, Carpenters Corners, Osbourne Bridge and North Broadalbin. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
